wikipedia_page.main: Major Richard Arthur Rubinstein MC TD (29 August 1921 – 23 February 2005) was a British Army officer who earned the Military Cross and the Croix de Guerre for organising guerrilla resistance in France and Burma.

response: His grandfather was army officer Richard Rubinstein, who earned the Military Cross and the Croix de Guerre during WWII.https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?id=257336394384907&story_fbid=1912938478824682 Jolyon's grandfather had been born to a Jewish-born father and a mother who had converted to Judaism. He later joined the Church of England when marrying Jolyon's paternal grandmother. His patrilineal Rubinstein ancestors have been born in England since at least Jolyon's great-grandfather. On his mother's side, he has Irish ancestry.
